815330.name: Smash The Rebels Soundtracs
815330.description:
This is additional content contains 22 carefully edited, ready-to-listen Soundtracs from Smash The Rebels -game!
New soundtracks will be added to this content during the development, so by buying this now you will be able to enjoy new content.

Genres:

Dubstep, Electro, Rock, Dance, Melancholy, Pop, Rythm and Rap and Relaxing

1. Viimeinen puolustuslinja (length 5 min 23 seconds, .mp3)
2. The Illusion (length 2 min 54 seconds, .mp3)
3. Whispering Shadows (length 3 min 32 seconds, .mp3)
4. A Dream That Came True Mix2 (length 2 min 59 seconds, .mp3)
5. A Dream That Came True (length 3 min 05 seconds, .mp3)
6. How (length 3 min 35 seconds, .mp3)
7. The Dream (length 3 min 07 seconds, .mp3)
8. Fever (length 2 min 51 seconds, .mp3)
9. Last Sunrice (length 4 min 01 seconds, .mp3)
10. Main theme Sinfonia intro (length 1 min 05 seconds, .mp3)
11. Melancolia (length 2 min 34 seconds, .mp3)
12. Defend the Base (length 1 min 56 seconds, .mp3)
13. Peaceful (length 1 min 36 seconds, .mp3)
14. Global Warning (length 4 min 25 seconds, .mp3)
15. Shamanic Dimension (length 3 min 38 seconds, .mp3)
16. Avaruus (length 2 min 34 seconds, .mp3)
17. City Under Attack drum & bass (length 0 min, 46 seconds .mp3)
18. Deep Electro 1 (length 2 min, 49 seconds .mp3)
19. Feels (length 3 min, 41 seconds .mp3)
20. Cylon (length 2 min, 38 seconds .mp3)
21. City under Attack (length 0 min, 46 seconds .mp3)
22. Mission In Space (length 1 min, 12 seconds, mp3)

After purchasing this content, you can listen these tracks by using Steam music player. You can also access these files directly from RTS Commander launcher or from your files root (for example: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\ and seek RTSsoundtracks -folder.

Please info us if you face any problem of finding RTS soundtracs -folder.

Please notice that some of soundtrack which you have heard in the game are not included to this content. This is because we do not have licence to sell some specific tracks. Content also contain tracks which have not yet been added to the game but will be added on the next updates!
